backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining product, order, vendor, and user profile types with maps for storage plus authorization and vendor checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI color and status‑related changes to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten textual summaries describing visual, styling, and functional behavior of key frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark modes and applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Simple HTML entry point loading the React bundle and root mount element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main routing setup using TanStack Router with role‑protected routes for customer, vendor, and admin sections.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper adding top/bottom navigation, background gradient, and the profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with options to return home or contact support.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication state and session clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter profile details and save them.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role-based access wrapper that blocks access unless the user has the required role.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar with dynamic active styling, icons, and a cart badge using cart query data.
frontend/src/components/buttons/PrimaryC: Styled button wrapper applying primary CTA gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/HeroBannerSlider: Auto-rotating image slider with navigation buttons and slide indicators.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Renders a responsive product grid with images, pricing, wishlist and cart actions, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/status/OrderStat: Badge displaying order status text with style classes derived from status.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with search, cart count, user actions, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login state, stored identities, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, role, product, and other marketplace data through the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures global Tailwind CSS styles, color variables, themes, and custom utility classes for the frontend.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page showcasing the platform's mission and benefits with styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing product, order, revenue, and vendor stats with a bar chart overview.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays all orders for admins with status controls and details, allowing updates via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Provides product CRUD management for admins, including dialogs for adding, editing, and deleting products.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminVendorsPag: Lists vendors and allows admins to add or remove vendor entries through a form dialog.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Implements the shopping cart page with item listing, quantity updates, removal, and checkout handling tied to user identity.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Displays a list of product categories with loading skeletons and links to category detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Displays products for a selected category with sorting and filtering, using ProductGrid for output.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Builds an order summary from cart items and processes order creation with identity validation.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with basic validation and static contact details.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerProf: Shows and edits the logged‑in user's profile information, saving updates via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Displays the customer's past orders with basic details and status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/customer/WishlistPage: Shows products saved in the user's wishlist by filtering all products against wishlist IDs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows hero banner, top categories, and sections for deals and featured products.
frontend/src/pages/ProductPage.tsx: Displays product details, image carousel, cart and wishlist actions, and review submission.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorDashboar: Vendor overview showing product count, orders, revenue, and links to manage products and view orders.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorOrdersPa: Vendor orders page that fetches and displays the vendor's orders with status, customer, items, date, and total.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorProducts: Vendor product management page allowing listing, creating, editing, and deleting products via dialogs and API mutations.
frontend/src/utils/statusStyles.ts: Utility functions mapping order and UI statuses to class names and text labels, including stock availability helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing existing features, schema version, and high-level system capabilities.
